title: vEl vAngu
sahitya:
vEl vAngu kaiyAval vinai tIr en ayyA


anupallavi

  mAl vAngum ennuDaiya mana mAyai ellAm kAl vAngi OdiDavE karuNai purivAyE


caraNam    mElOngi alai shuruLum viyanshendil ninrOi viNNOrgaL iDarellAm oru noDiyil konrOi 
vAl Ongum anattavargaL vaNangu tamizh murugA mayilEri aruLODu edirE nI varuvAi
